body.name: VIVO Premium Aluminum Single TV Wall Mount for 23 to 43 inch Screens, Adjustable Arm, Fits up to VESA 200x200, MOUNT-G200B
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 41 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 11 mins
features: Counterbalance Wall Mount elevates your 23” to 43” TV screen (with VESA 75x75mm to 200x200mm mounting holes) to a position that reduces strain on your neck, back, and eyes for a comfortable viewing experience.

Fluid Motion with -15° to +5° tilt, 180° swivel, and 6° rotation to find that perfect viewing angle for the whole group to enjoy. A powerful pneumatic spring arm also provides 10” of height adjustment for maximum flexibility.

Solid Construction designed for scratch resistance and durability makes this mount capable of supporting a TV weighing up to 50.6 lbs (3 times strength tested). The screen must weigh a minimum of 11 lbs to properly counterbalance the arm weight.

Save Desk Space and protect your expensive equipment by getting the TV conveniently mounted to the wall at an ideal height. When not in use, fold the arm back against the wall to save additional space.
Minimal Assembly with all the necessary hardware and instructions provided to get your new screen mount put together and easily installed with a convenient keyhole mounting pattern.
body.description: Why Choose VIVO? We Save You Money. Many ergonomic office solutions come at a high cost. Our mission is to use innovation, creativity, and efficiency to produce a more affordable solution that doesn't sacrifice quality. We Make It Easy. We want our products to be easily accessible to the millions of office workers around the globe so that comfort and productivity can brighten your day and strengthen your career. We Care About Your Experience. We don't just sell products... we sell solutions for needs encountered in the workplace. Our prompt and friendly service will ensure those solutions work for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Protect your equipment and find excellent viewing angles with the Premium Aluminum TV Wall Mount (MOUNT-G200B) from VIVO! Thanks to the ergonomic design of this mount, you can reduce the strain on your neck, back, and eyes during your favorite sports game or work presentation. Getting your screen mounted to the wall clears up valuable space and protects your TV from falls and collisions. The solid steel and aluminum construction with a stable design supports 23” to 43” flat screen TV’s weighing up to 50.6 lbs with VESA 75x75mm to 200x200mm mounting holes. Experience excellent viewing angles with -15° to +5° tilt, 180° swivel, and 6° rotation in addition to 10” of height adjustment with powerful pneumatic spring lift. A cable management system has been integrated to keep potentially messy cords clean and organized. All the necessary hardware and instructions are provided to get your new mount installed in no time!

Counterbalance Height Adjustment The internal pneumatic spring arm adjusts to the weight of your TV creating a suspended free-floating effect that lets you instantly adjust the height of your screen without the use of tools. The arm is designed to support most 23” to 43” flat TV’s weighing up to 50.6 lbs. Note: The screen must weigh at least 11 lbs for the counterbalance arm to work properly. All the Right Angles This adjustable TV wall mount offers excellent flexibility at the touch of a hand. The articulating arm provides -15° to +5° tilt, 180° swivel, and 6° rotation (screen leveling) to create comfortable viewing angles all day long. The mount can collapse against the wall surface to attain a low profile and rests 18.1” from the wall when fully extended. Versatile Mount This innovative product is compatible with VESA 75x75mm to 200x200mm mounting holes, making it able to fit some types of computer monitors weighing at least 11 pounds. The open top slots on the brackets simplify the mounting process so you can get your screen secured to the bracket and providing comfortable viewing angles in no time!

Why Choose VIVO? We Save You Money. Many ergonomic office solutions come at a high cost. Our mission is to use innovation, creativity, and efficiency to produce a more affordable solution that doesn't sacrifice quality. We Make It Easy. We want our products to be easily accessible to the millions of office workers around the globe so that comfort and productivity can brighten your day and strengthen your career. We Care About Your Experience. We don't just sell products... we sell solutions for needs encountered in the workplace. Our prompt and friendly service will ensure those solutions work for you. Specifications Screen Size: 23” to 43” VESA Compatibility: 75x75mm, 100x100mm, 200x100mm, and 200x200mm Profile (from wall): 2.8” to 18.1” Height Adjustment: 10” with a pneumatic spring arm Articulation: -15° to +5° tilt, 180° swivel, and 6° rotation Minimum Weight Capacity: 11 lbs Maximum Weight Capacity: 50.6 lbs
VIVO - We make it easy. At VIVO, we turn innovative ideas into solutions that brighten your day and strengthen your career.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this was very easy to install and does fabulous job holding up our outdoor TV. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice mount but minor issues
reviews.reviewText: It is a fantastic TV mount. Use it for front of treadmill.The mount is heavy-duty and very strong. Thus, the difficulty with mounting because it is heavy/awkward, the wall side mount does not remove so you have to hold up the entire mount while trying to keep it plumb and mark the holes correctly. This was quite difficult.Finally, once installed, could not get the arm to maneuver down. Had to use the online chat operator who did help clarify some things.The best position of the arm is where the TV and arm is level (not up or down). This way, you have room to adjust up and down afterwards. When the arm is positioned up (almost permanently), it is hard to estimate where that middle position is. So had to do a lot of thinking, planning and calculating.Once it was mounted to the wall and TV placed onto the mount, I could not get the arm to move down. Took a LONG time and many, many turns of the screw before the internal gas cylinder released, causing the TV to nearly fall down. Then, you re-tighten the screw gradually until you get the correct tension of the arms to hold the TV steady in position. Now, I simply love the mount, but installation by myself was quite difficulty. Instructions did not help much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for my 49" Odyssey G9
reviews.reviewText: Bought this monitor arm specifically for my (very large and heavy) Samsung Odyssey G9, a 49" super ultra-wide curved monitor. The arm is able to support the weight of the monitor fine (after tightening up some of the screws as necessary) and it works great for me. I was having a lot of trouble finding a wall-mounted arm that would support this size/weight of monitor so am glad to find one that worked so well and at such a great price compared to competitors!Only issue is that the monitor has a very slight tilt to the right due to the weight of the monitor and the position of the arm. The tilt is very minor and doesn't bother me, but if you've got a similarly large/heavy monitor and are OCD or think that if the monitor isn't *perfectly* level then you might be better off looking elsewhere (unfortunately, that means either significantly higher cost, or a design with much less mobility).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Wall Mount For My 55" LCD TV
reviews.reviewText: Great wall mount just check your TVs weight mine was within a LB of the max but is holding well. I left the allen wrenches in if I needed to adjust it. It was easy to install and adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Worked as described. Very solid. However, even if you are handy, installation will probably be easier if done by two persons. The arm tension is set at max but can easily be reduced once screwed to the wall. The TV can then be attached to the arm and tension reset to match the weight of the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This mount replaces a previous one that really only provided side-to-side movement (and some tilt with difficulty). Folks could not understand that it did not raise and lower, so somebody pulled the mounting screws through the drywall drying to raise or lower the screen. We shopped around and similar models by other mfg got poor reviews from folks - particularly the pneumatic ones. This one is "spring" balanced and got fewer reviews about adjustment problems. Things that I am pleased about. 1) It was easy to install (really). 2) The counter balance adjustment is on top and always exposed. Some models got bad reviews because the adjustment was impossible to get to. 3) The tilt is smooth. Our old one was not this nice. 4) Once adjusted, it is easy to swing it side to side or move it up or down. My only concern was that my monitor may be too light for the spring balance (see the seller notes), but that was not a problem at all. We use it in a camp kitchen where some folks sit, others stand, and lots of people touch it through the day. Needless to say, nobody has jerked this one off the wall. I am a happy camper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Barely OK, wouldn't buy again
reviews.reviewText: This thing is what it says it is but:- The wood installation screws have weak heads that easily strip- The attachment plate's up and down tilt is too loose- The feel while adjusting the arm isn't great- You'll be there for awhile loosening the cylinder so the arm can lower with a lighter TVThis item is what it says it is but if I need another one that does the same thing I'll spend more and hope for a higher quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked with my Odyssey G9!
reviews.reviewText: I went off of a recommendation I saw on reddit. I mounted this to a dry wall stud, the mount was super secure in there. The mount extensions weren’t necessarily for the visa mount. The attachment mechanism was very sound, it hooks onto 2 bolts via gravity and a third bolt under the mount to seal the deal.The gas pump is super strong, can easily hold huge TV’s and it held the Odyssey G9 just fine, with it being around 33 lbs.One thing was the tilt sagging, that is normally an issue with mounts and I can say that the center of gravity for the monitor was a liiiitle too much for the tension on the tilt swivel for this mount. I tried tightening it, but it didn’t seem to work that well. You can probably tighten it just perfectly, but in the end we just stuck a bolt through the hole where the tilt sags. And the monitor is now perfectly straight, and we can move it around.
I have a 40" TV this is mounted to and it swings lower over my apartment piano. Does the job and is sturdy.

reviews.reviewerName: Robuste,facile à manier,ne prend pas de place. Satisfaite

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Es ligero y resistente además de tener mucha movilidad

Sturdy enough for my need. Instructions are easy to understand. Installation is very simple with just a couple of bolts. The adjustable pneumatic spring works well once set correctly. Overall, a very good mount.
